English:
When receiving non-Pain damage, recover &dustNum (Dust stacks) HP.

<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceLowLayer: Reflect &dustDamage (Dust stacks * &dustRate) Pain damage to the source when receiving non-Pain damage.</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: At max Dust stacks, gain "Dust" and deal &regDmg (&regDmgPer% Healing Power) damage to a random enemy.</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: Reflected damage increases by &buffDmg (&buffDmgPer% of your buff stacks).</color>
Chinese:
受到非痛苦伤害时，回复&dustNum(微尘层数)点体力值.

</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 受到非痛苦伤害时，对伤害来源反弹&dustDamage(自身“微尘”增益层数*&dustRate)点痛苦伤害.
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 在“微尘”增益层数已满时获得“微尘”增益，对随机敌人造成&regDmg(&regDmgPer%治疗力)点伤害.
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 反弹的伤害值增加&buffDmg(自身&buffDmgPer%增益层数).</color>

English: Crit Rate additionally increases by Dust stacks * &criDustRate.
Chinese: 暴击率额外增加自身“微尘”层数*&criDustRate.

English:
This buff can grant Dust up to &maxAddDust times.

<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceLowLayer: When applying Pain debuffs, &dustDotPer% chance to gain Dust.</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: When applying Weakness debuffs, &dustDebuffPer% chance to gain Dust.</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: When applying Disruption debuffs, &dustCCPer% chance to gain Dust.</color>
Chinese:
此增益获得的“微尘”增益次数最多为&maxAddDust.

</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 对敌人施加痛苦减益时，&dustDotPer%概率获得微尘.
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 对敌人施加弱化减益时，&dustDebuffPer%概率获得微尘.
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 对敌人施加干扰减益时，&dustCCPer%概率获得微尘.</color>

English: Grants ATK and Healing Power equal to &attrPer% of current HP limit (up to &maxAttrNum).
Chinese: 根据当前体力极限的&attrPer%获得攻击力和治疗力加成(最高为&maxAttrNum).

English:
During countdown, attack skills target random enemies, dealing &totalDamageNum (&regDmgPer% Healing Power + &pBuffDmgPer% Collective Souls' Call stacks + &recoverPer% HP limit record) damage. Max &maxAtkTimes uses.

Remaining uses: &lastAtkTimes
Chinese:
倒计时期间，使用攻击技能时攻击随机敌人, 造成&totalDamageNum(&regDmgPer%治疗力 + &pBuffDmgPer%众魂层数 + &recoverPer%体力极限记录值)点伤害，最多&maxAtkTimes次.

剩余次数: &lastAtkTimes

English: The Collective Souls follow the Monarch, believing in her path
Chinese: 众魂追随着魔王，坚信她引领的道路

English: Grants 1 stack of Dust to a random ally each turn
Chinese: 每回合为随机队员赋予1层“微尘”增益

English:
"I Am Here" gains Dust with 100% chance.
<color=#A5AAA3>"I will stay by Amiya's side"</color>
Chinese:
“我在”获得“微尘”增益的概率变为100%.
</color><color=#A5AAA3>“我会陪在阿米娅身边”</color>

English:
Heals (Civilight Eterna's Level (&recoverNum) + &healRegPer% Healing Power (&healRegNum)) HP per turn.
&createDustPer% chance to gain 1 Dust stack each turn
Chinese:
每回合治疗值相当于魔王等级(&recoverNum)+&healRegPer%治疗力(&healRegNum).
每回合有&createDustPer%的概率获得1层“微尘”增益

English: When dealing damage to enemies, heals a random ally for 10% of the damage dealt (minimum 1).
Chinese: 对敌人造成伤害时，伤害值的10%(最低为1)对随机队员进行治疗.

English: When overhealed, gain 1 stack of Collective Souls' Protection
Chinese: 当回复超出体力极限时，获得1层“众魂庇护”增益

English:
Increases ATK and Healing Power by &normalInitAddNum initially, then by &normalTurnAddLayerNum per turn (up to Civilight Eterna's Level (&buffUserLv)).
"I Am Here" gains Dust with &skillR0Per% probability.

<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceLowLayer: Initial ATK/Healing bonus becomes &lowInitAddNum.</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: Turn-based increase becomes &middleTurnAddLayerNum.</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: Increases Crit Rate by &addCriNum%.</color>
Chinese:
攻击力与治疗力增加&normalInitAddNum，并每回合增加&normalTurnAddLayerNum，最高达到魔王的等级(&buffUserLv).
“我在”的获得“微尘”增益概率提高至&skillR0Per%.
</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 初始的攻击力、治疗力加成变为&lowInitAddNum.
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 每回合增加的数值变为&middleTurnAddLayerNum.
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 增加&addCriNum%暴击率.</color>

English:
Damage increases by the target's Pain debuff stacks (max &maxDotDmgAdd).
 
<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceLowLayer: Inflicts Stun (<sprite=2> &controlPer%) when dealing damage.</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: Adds &pBuffDmgNum (&pBuffDmgPer% Collective Souls' Call stacks) bonus damage.</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: Duration increased by &addLifeTime turns.</color>
Chinese:
造成伤害时，伤害值增加目标痛苦减益层数的值(最高&maxDotDmgAdd)

</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 造成伤害时，对目标造成眩晕(<sprite=2> &controlPer%).
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 伤害增加值附加&pBuffDmgNum(&pBuffDmgPer%众魂层数)的数值.
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 持续时间增加&addLifeTime回合.</color>

English: Starts with "Collective Souls' Trial" equipment. Defeating enemies grants "Collective Souls' Call" stacks for the entire cycle. At certain stacks, enhances Civilight Eterna's skills. Collective Souls >=25: Choose between "Withering and Flourishing" or "Vitality" branch buffs. - Active from Level 1
Chinese: 初始获得装备“众魂的试炼”, 装备后击败敌人可获得“众魂呼号”增益，持续整个循环，“众魂呼号”到达一定层数时使魔王的技能获得增强效果. 众魂层数>=25时: 选择获得分支增益“枯荣”或“生息”. - 此被动从1级开始生效

English: The Monarch walks with life, leading souls against fate. Now, she fights alongside you.
Chinese: 魔王以生践行，引领众魂反抗命运，如今的她，正与你并肩而战.

English: The Monarch's usual attire, suitable for any occasion.
Chinese: 魔王常穿的款式，可以在任何场合穿着，非常方便.

English: I will protect you. Hold on!
Chinese: 我会保护你的, 坚持住!
不要着急，我在你的身边.

English:
Grants all enemies "ATK+15%, Healing Power+15%, Max HP+20%".

Defeating enemies:
Normal: +1 Collective Souls' Call
Cursed: +2 Collective Souls' Call
BOSS: +3 Collective Souls' Call

Exclusive to Civilight Eterna. Upgrades at max Collective Souls' Call.
Chinese:
所有敌人获得"攻击力+15%, 治疗力+15%, 最大生命值+20%"的增益.

击败敌人时:
普通级敌人: 获得1层“众魂呼号”增益.
诅咒级敌人: 获得2层“众魂呼号”增益.
BOSS级敌人: 获得3层“众魂呼号”增益.

该装备无法通过常规途径获得, 仅魔王可以装备.
在“众魂呼号”增益达到最高层数时升级.

English:
Battle start: All allies gain "Crit Rate+10%". 
All enemies gain "Damage Taken+10%" (<sprite=0>300%).

Exclusive to Civilight Eterna.
Chinese:
战斗开始时，为所有队员添加“暴击率+10%”的增益.
为所有敌人添加“受到的伤害+10%”(<sprite=0>300%)的减益.

该装备无法通过常规途径获得, 仅魔王可以装备.

English: At turn end, Support allies deal damage equal to 10% Healing Power + 50% of their Healing over time to all enemies.
Chinese: 按下回合结束按钮时，所有支援型角色各自以自身治疗力10%+持续治疗值的50%对所有敌人造成伤害.

English:
This skill can be used 3 times.

<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks>= &ceLowLayer: Grants 1 stack of Dust to self.</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: Gain &healNum (&healPBuffPer% Collective Souls' Call stacks) Healing over time.</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: Randomly removes one Pain or Weakness debuff from the target.</color>
Chinese:
此技能可使用3次.

</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 为自身赋予1层“微尘”增益.
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 获得&healNum(&healPBuffPer%众魂层数)点持续治疗.
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 为目标随机解除一个痛苦、弱化减益.</color>

English:
<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks>= &ceLowLayer: Grants &barrierNum (&barrierPer% Healing) Shield.</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: Healing increased by &pBuffHealNum (&pBuffHealPer% Collective Souls' Call stacks).</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: Target gains "Collective Souls' Wrath" buff.</color>
Chinese:
</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 获得&barrierNum(&barrierPer%治疗值)点护盾值.
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 治疗值增加&pBuffHealNum(&pBuffHealPer%众魂层数).
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 目标获得“众魂之怒”增益.</color>

English: Grants Healing over time equal to &healPer% HP limit + &pBuffHealPer% Collective Souls (&pBuffHealNum), then triggers existing Healing over time effects.
Chinese: 根据各个目标的&healPer%体力极限+&pBuffHealPer%众魂层数(&pBuffHealNum)获得持续治疗增益，并立即触发一次目标的持续治疗效果.

English:
Adjust all allies' HP to the lowest member's ratio (minimum 1), then grant a group Shield equal to &barrierPer% of the total reduction.

<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks>= &ceLowLayer: Allies with >&proDustNum Dust gain "Healing Gauge Protection".</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: If reduction >0, deal equal Pain damage to a random enemy.</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: Target gains "Empathy of Sorrow".</color>
Chinese:
所有队员体力值调整至最低的队员的比例(最低为1)，获得总向下调整值&barrierPer%的群体保护罩.

</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 微尘层数大于&proDustNum的友军获得“保护体力极限”增益.
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 如果调整值大于0，则对随机敌人造成调整值的痛苦伤害.
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 目标获得“哀恸共情”增益.</color>

English:
Deals &costHpPer% of max HP as Pain damage to target and self.

<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks>= &ceLowLayer: Self and target gain "Vision of Mercy".</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: Draw 1 skill when used.</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: Gain &highAddDustLayer additional Dust stacks.</color>
Chinese:
对目标与自身造成&costHpPer%体力上限的痛苦伤害

</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer, 自身与目标获得“慈悲愿景”增益.
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer, 使用时抽取1个技能.
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer, 额外获得&highAddDustLayer层“微尘”增益.</color>

English:
Records the total HP limit of all allies upon use. Deals &totalAttackTimes (Dust stacks on field + &extraAtkTimes) instances of &totalDamageNum (&regDmgPer% Healing Power + &pBuffDmgPer% Collective Souls' Call stacks + &recoverPer% recorded HP limit) damage to random enemies. Consumes all Dust.

<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks>= &ceLowLayer: Applies "Monarch's Erosion" debuff (<sprite=1>100%) on hit.</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: Applies "Monarch's Awe" debuff (<sprite=0>100%) on hit.</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: Applies "Monarch's Radiance" debuff (<sprite=0>100%) on hit.</color>
Chinese:
记录使用时所有友军的体力极限之和, 对敌方随机目标造成&totalAttackTimes(场上微尘层数 + &extraAtkTimes)次&totalDamageNum(&regDmgPer%治疗力 + &pBuffDmgPer%众魂层数 + &recoverPer%体力极限记录值)点伤害，消除所有微尘

</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 攻击时对目标施加“魔王的侵蚀”减益(<sprite=1>100%).
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 攻击时对目标施加“魔王的震慑”减益(<sprite=0>100%).
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 攻击时对目标施加“魔王的威光”减益(<sprite=0>100%).</color>

English:
On use, deals &hpDmgPer% of max HP as Pain damage to all allies and records their total HP limit. During countdown, attacking with non-Healing skills deals (&regDmgPer% Healing Power + &pBuffDmgPer% Collective Souls' Call stacks + &recoverPer% recorded HP limit) damage to a random enemy (up to &maxAtkTimes times).

<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks>= &ceLowLayer: Allies with >&proDustNum Dust gain "Healing Gauge Protection".</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: Attacks randomly apply 1 stack of a Pain debuff (Bleed, Burn, Poison).</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: After triggering &apAtkTimes follow-up attacks, restore 1 Mana (up to &apTimes times).</color>
Chinese:
使用时, 对所有友军造成&hpDmgPer%体力上限的痛苦伤害，记录所有友军的体力极限之和. 倒计时期间,使用非治疗技能时攻击随机敌人, 造成(&regDmgPer%治疗力 + &pBuffDmgPer%众魂层数 + &recoverPer%体力极限记录值)点伤害，最多&maxAtkTimes次.

</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 微尘层数大于&proDustNum的友军获得“保护体力极限”增益.
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 攻击会随机附带1层痛苦减益(流血、灼烧、中毒).
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 触发&apAtkTimes次追击后，回复1点法力值(最多&apTimes次).</color>

English: Draw 2 skills. If any ally has max Dust, draw +1.
Chinese: 抽取2个技能, 如果有队员微尘层数已满, 则额外抽取1个技能.

English:
Placed atop the deck at battle start.  
This skill's effects grow while held in hand.
Chinese:
战斗开始时，放在牌库的最上方.
此技能效果在手牌中也会增长.

English:
Removes all Pain and Weakness debuffs from the target and spreads them to all enemies.

<color=red>&lowLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks>= &ceLowLayer: Grants "Healing Gauge Protection" to the target.</color>
<color=green>&middleLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceMiddleLayer: Deals damage equal to &healDmgPer% of the target's Healing over time to a random enemy.</color>
<color=yellow>&highLayerIcon Collective Souls' Call stacks >= &ceHighLayer: Grants &highAddDustLayer additional Dust stacks.</color>
Chinese:
解除目标所有痛苦、弱化减益并扩散至所有敌人.

</color>&lowLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceLowLayer: 目标获得“体力极限保护”增益.
</color>&middleLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceMiddleLayer: 目标根据自身持续治疗值的&healDmgPer%对随机敌人造成伤害.
</color>&highLayerIcon众魂层数>=&ceHighLayer: 额外获得&highAddDustLayer层“微尘”增益.</color>

English: Damage increased by 25% of HP limit.
Chinese: 伤害提高25%体力极限的值.

English: On play: Heal random ally for 40% of higher value between ATK/Healing Power, then grant 1 Dust.
Chinese: 打出时以攻击力和治疗力的较高值的40%对随机队员治疗，并赋予1层“微尘”增益.
